devdoc.author: Marius Reimer

params.moves: Set of positions claimed for the win
params.who: The Player who claimed the win

checkHasWon(uint256,uint8,uint8[4]).return: true if won, else exception is thrown

isContractOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

params.position: Board position for the desired move

params.playerTwo: The second player to join this game

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Contract for a Connect Four Game

checkHasWon(uint256,uint8,uint8[4]).notice: Check if claimed moves are a valid win

giveUp(uint256).notice: Give players the possibilty to give up at any time, so that the other player wins

makeMove(uint256,uint8).notice: Checks and persists the move on the board

newGame().notice: Creates a non restricted game (anyone can join)

newRestrictedGame(address).notice: Creates a restricted game (only the specified player can join)

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

withdraw(uint256).notice: The winner may withdraw the amount
